EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1349103613.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Sterling, No problem at all, good to hear from you. I would love to talk to you this afternoon, you may reach out to me directly or book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I am afriad I do not have your phone number. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sterling Hayden [mailto:sterling.t.hayden@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, September 28, 2012 5:49 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Sara,Sorry it has taken me so long to get back to you. Thank you for reaching out to me. I was impressed with the way that you handled Stefanie's account. It was a thought that maybe you could help with managing my account if i was able to find work as a indiviual contractor. I am available in the afternoon on Monday to talk.On Fri, Sep 28, 2012 at 4:57 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Sterling , I am sorry we have had trouble connecting. Now might not be the right time for you. You may find some of the resources we develop specifically designed for independent consultants helpful for you: - Recorded Independent Consulting Webinar Index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcp0t%2F5fvXNuflnizEf5aIvLF8APuo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Reports on Independent Consulting in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcp0t%2F5fvXNuflnizEf5aIvLF8APuo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Independent Consulting Brief Monthly <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcp0t%2F5fvXNuflnizEf5aIvLF8APuo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Any update would be great, you may simply reply to this email. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, September 18, 2012 4:39 PM To: 'sterling.t.hayden@gmail.com <mailto:sterling.t.hayden@gmail.com>' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Sterling, Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Stefanie Hayden. Stefanie has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcp0t%2F5fvXNuflnizEf5aIvLF8APuo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to see if it is something that you might find valuable.
